Rancang konsert istimewa
03 Nov 2019, 05:01 by Ramlah Zainal
SEMUA artis ada impian untuk mengadakan konsert atau persembahan istimewa yang melengkapi profil seni masing-masing.
Menurut penyanyi popular, Datin Alyah, 38, dia juga teringin mengadakan konsert sempena meraikan ulang tahun ke-20 pembabitannya dalam dunia muzik pada tahun depan.
“Saya akui tidak mudah untuk buat konsert mahupun ‘showcase’ pada zaman kegawatan pasaran album.
“Namun, saya akan bekerja keras merealisasikan konsert itu kerana percaya dengan rezeki kurniaan Allah SWT,” katanya.
Mengulas lanjut perkara itu, Alyah atau nama sebenarnya, Noor Hasliah Abu Hassan berkata, ia masih dalam perancangan.
“Buat masa ini, saya cari penaja yang berminat untuk membantu merealisasikan konsert saya nanti.
“Saya juga mengalu-alukan pihak korporat atau orang perseorangan yang mahu bekerjasama,” katanya.
Ditanya lokasi konsert pula, kata Alyah, ia belum diputuskan lagi.
“Ada cadangansama ada Istana Budaya atau stadium, tetapi belum diputuskan lagi.
“Mereka yang berminat bekerjasama dalam konsert ini boleh berhubung dengan pengurusan saya, Warner Music,” katanya.
Selain konsert, Alyah juga bakal melancarkan koleksi minyak wanginya iaitu Queen Alyah pada Januari depan.
“Selain nyanyian, saya juga membuka bisnes sebagai jaminan masa depan.
“Antaranya bisnes minyak wangi yang dibuat khusus buat peminat yang setia menyokong kerjaya saya,” katanya.


PENYANYI, Datin Alyah. FOTO Intan Nur Elliana Zakaria


SINGLE BAHARU LEBIH RANCAK

Berbanding lagu Sesal Separuh Nyawa, menurut Alyah, single Meluruh kurang mendapat tempat di stesen radio tempatan.
Single Meluruh ciptaan Alyah, Helen Yap dan lirik oleh Slen manakala video muziknya mendapat sentuhan sutradara Ghaz Abu Bakar.
“Saya tidak kesah lagu Meluruh lambat naik kerana masih giat dipromosikan.
“Meluruh akan menjadi lagu tema drama televisyen tidak lama lagi dan semoga ia membantu menaikkan lagi populariti lagu ini,” katanya.
Mengenai pembikinan lagu baharu pula, isteri pengarah muzik terkenal Datuk Ramli M.S ini juga terbuka untuk bekerjasama dengan komposer baharu berbakat besar.
“Saya mahu bekerja dengan komposer lain pula kerana mahukan kelainan. Antara komposer dalam senarai ialah Omar K.
“Saya mahu hasilkan lagu rancak dan berbeza daripada yang pernah dihasilkan sebelum ini,” katanya.

Plan a special concert
03 Nov 2019, 05:01 by Ramlah Zainal
ALL artists have dreams of holding special concerts or performances that complement their respective art profiles.
According to popular singer Datin Alyah, 38, she also wants to hold a concert in celebration of her 20th anniversary in the music world next year.
“I admit that it's not easy to do concerts or showcases in times of album market turmoil.
"However, I will work hard to realize the concert because I believe in the gift of Allah Almighty," he said.
Commenting on the matter, Alyah or her real name, Noor Hasliah Abu Hassan, said she was still planning.
“For now, I'm looking for an interested sponsor to help make my concert a reality later.
"I also welcome corporations or individuals who want to work together," he said.
Asked about the location of the concert, Alyah said, it had not been decided yet.
“There is a possibility that there is a Cultural Palace or a stadium, but it has not been decided yet.
"Those who are interested in collaborating on this concert can contact my management, Warner Music," he said.
In addition to concerts, Alyah will also launch her collection of Queen Alyah perfume next January.
“Besides singing, I also open my business as a guarantee of the future.
"Some of the perfume businesses are made specifically for fans who are loyal to my career," he said.


The owner, Datin Alyah. PHOTO Intan Nur Elliana Zakaria


MORE NEW SINGLE

Compared to the song Half Life, according to Alyah, the single Singles lacks a place on local radio stations.
Singles features Alyah, Helen Yap's lyrics and lyrics by Slen while her music video captures a touch of director Ghaz Abu Bakar.
"I do not like the song Jumping up as it is still being promoted.
"Wide will be a television drama theme song soon and hopefully it will help to increase the popularity of this song," he said.
On the production of new songs, the wife of renowned music director Datuk Ramli M.S is also open to collaborate with talented new composers.
“I want to work with other composers because they want something different. Among the composers on the list is Omar K.
"I want to produce a lively and different song than it has ever done before," he said.
